title: Acme Relationship Standard
description: Acme Corp relationship standard extending the CALM core relationship. Adds required operational properties used for security, classification, SLAs and delivery mode.

encrypted.description: Whether data transmitted over this relationship is encrypted in transit (for example TLS/mTLS).

dataClassification.description: Classification of data sent over this connection; drives logging, encryption, and access controls.

sla.description: Expected service-level objective for the relationship (e.g., '99.9% within 200ms' or 'best-effort').

mode.description: Indicates whether the interaction is synchronous (request/response) or asynchronous (event/queue based).
